statements: SELECT * FROM research_articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author_name, publication_date FROM research_articles WHERE author_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, title, abstract FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) as total_articles FROM research_articles GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_articles DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_articles WHERE author_name IN ('Alice Johnson', 'David Miller', 'Emily Brown') ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, author_name FROM research_articles WHERE author_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT title, abstract FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, author_name FROM research_articles WHERE title LIKE '%machine learning%' AND author_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM research_articles WHERE title LIKE '%data%' AND author_name <> 'Bob' ORDER BY title ASC, publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors
SELECT author_name, author_id FROM authors
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM articles
SELECT article_title, author_id FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM authors, articles WHERE authors.author_id = articles.author_id
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM authors JOIN articles ON authors.author_id = articles.author_id WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_title LIKE '%database%' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date ASC, article_id DESC;

SELECT author_name, COUNT(article_id) AS num_articles FROM authors LEFT JOIN articles ON authors.author_id = articles.author_id GROUP BY author_name HAVING num_articles > 3 ORDER BY num_articles DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM authors JOIN articles ON authors.author_id = articles.author_id WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM authors JOIN articles ON authors.author_id = articles.author_id ORDER BY author_name ASC, publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_articles;
SELECT title, author FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM research_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT publication_id, publication_date FROM publication_dates WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, title FROM research_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM research_articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT research_articles.title, authors.author_name FROM research_articles JOIN authors ON research_articles.author = authors.author_name;
SELECT COUNT(*), author_name FROM research_articles JOIN authors ON research_articles.author = authors.author_name GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, abstract FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT author_name, keyword FROM authors INNER JOIN articles ON authors.author_id = articles.author_id INNER JOIN article_keywords ON articles.article_id = article_keywords.article_id INNER JOIN keywords ON article_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.keyword_id;
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT author_name, affiliation, email FROM authors WHERE affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT title, abstract FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT authors.author_name, articles.title FROM authors JOIN articles ON authors.author_id = articles.author_id;
SELECT * FROM articles
SELECT title, author_id FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT article_id, title FROM articles WHERE author_id = 1
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01'
SELECT author_id, COUNT(*) FROM articles GROUP BY author_id
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT title, author_id FROM articles WHERE author_id = 5
SELECT article_id, title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND publication_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(article_id) AS total_articles FROM articles
